entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:48 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

Temperature: 6.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with a few flurries beginning this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
